The audio on this rip is f'ed up.  The GSpot v2.70a codec identifier utility produces an unidentified error regarding the audio stream.  Downloading a codec pack as suggested is a good way to pick up a trojan/virus/spyware/etc. and is no guarantee you'll end up with what you really need.  Would someone PLEASE identify the proper codec required to process the audio on this rip?
